channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: ‘Quordle’ Hints Today: Saturday, October 4 Clues, Answers
item.description: Looking for some help with today’s Quordle words? Some hints and the answers are right here to give you a hand.

item.title: Hope Is On The Horizon For Huntington’s Patients
item.description: New data from a gene therapy trial provide the first credible evidence that the progression of Huntington’s disease may be slowed by a single, targete...

item.title: Netflix’s ‘Monster: Ed Gein’ Has A Surprising Rotten Tomatoes Score
item.description: Netflix has just released Monster: The Ed Gein Story today, and its Rotten Tomatoes score is very surprising, given its high profile.

item.title: China’s Climate Push Is An Economic Power Play
item.description: China is turning climate policy into economic power, while US, UK, and EU politics stall on wedge issues, reshaping global markets and competitiveness...

item.title: The ‘Halo’ Show Is Now On Netflix, And You Must See It To Believe It
item.description: Netflix has just gotten one of the most ridiculous video game adaptations ever, Paramount's Halo show that aired a year ago.

item.title: Two kinds of confrontations

item.title: Reciprocity
item.description: Our biggest commitments, the things we are most dedicated to, rarely pay us back in equal measure. That might be the point.

item.title: Recalculating the cost of convenience
